name: Zen Robot
description:
The captured Zen Disk must be recovered! Utilize patience and agility in this retro style platformer. Jump, Shoot, and Stomp enemies to elevate to the next level. Obtain the Zen Disk for ultimate control of the program. Your Journey includes:

- Over 25 Levels
- Variety of Power Ups & Enemies
- Save Progress Feature
- Touchscreen or Gamepad Input

- Simply Free, No Ads or In App Purchases

Good Luck on your journey !
